txt.en:
You read:

'Brother, the last group of captives has been secured deep within the waterfall. These foul invaders have infested our land, harry our men, and will be taught a lesson.

'The filth in our cages will be a fitting tribute for our masters in among the crags to the east.  The weaker ones can be traded to the giants for protection. 

'Send a few men to the waterfall to guard the prisoners, when you have a chance.'

Someone should be told of this letter.
'Thank you for returning with this note, [placeholder]. \n\n'It bodes poorly for those that journeyed here with me, but perhaps there may be time to save them.'
This note describes a hideous end for any that would fall into the clutches of the Draig-l√ªth, which have come north out of Dunland.
Bring the note to Gronu at his camp
Gronu can be found at his camp north of Harndirion, at the foot of the mountain.\n\nYou should seek out Gronu and give him the message that you found.
